content.text: A computer follows instructions to process information. It has hardware and software.

items: Hardware: the physical parts you can touch.
Software: the programs that tell the hardware what to do.

content.text: Use strong passphrases and do not share them. Be careful with unknown links and attachments.

items: Use a passcode on shared devices.
Log out of accounts when finished.

quiz.prompt: Which is a safer passphrase approach?
